subject: Wages and Salaries
Baseball
Hockey, Ice
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Depending on the idiosyncrasies of a league’s salary structure, teams may be motivated to clear a big contract off their books to make room for another player — or many other players.
snippet: Depending on the idiosyncrasies of a league’s salary structure, teams may be motivated to clear a big contract off their books to make room for another player — or many other players.
